title: Spanish Style House Share - West Hollywood
posting_body: Very spacious 2 bedroom, 1.5 bath Spanish style home - Available September/October 2022
This is a shared home, no couples, no pets, no smoking.
The home is professionally designed and fully furnished.
Located in the heart of West Hollywood.
(Two blocks north of Melrose and three blocks South of Santa Monica Blvd.)
This is an ideal location for anyone who enjoys walking to coffee shops, restaurants, great shopping and sight seeing.
Amenities include:  washer/dryer, air conditioning, heat.
Must include social media handle or send resume and photo when connecting.
Additional fee's are:  Parking passes and Wifi.
